RelatedSentence: Pol Col Chainarong Charoenchainao , deputy commander and spokesman of the ECD , said while most users of pirated software were caught in Greater Bangkok , hundreds of investigations are ongoing in the Northeast and the South as part of greater enforcement action in those regions this year .

He also said quite a few raided companies were units of foreign firms - for example , in Samut Prakan a Thai - Japanese auto - parts maker with 140 million baht in revenue last year was caught using unlicensed programs from Siemens PLM Software .
